author: water_jedi_17
title: Star wars magnet set
review:
I got this through shop at home a while ago and mostly use them as minifigs.
 
 Chewie is made of two parts since the legs and torso are connected by the magnet.Chewie's head seems to have no eyes and a ammo belt.
 Obi-Wan has the head from ultimate space battle set and for some reason has peach legs and not the legs that he had in General greivous chase.
 Darth Vader has a chrome lightsaber(like Obi) and has a realistic burned,gray face.
 A thing I noticed was that lego S@H magazine and lego.com had different prices.The magazine had 9.99 USD and the website had 12.99 USD and when discounted to 9.98,most people saved a cent compared to the magazine price. 
The magnets are fun to play with but Chewie somtimes turns upside down because of his head.
